name: CreateNewLocation
description:
Create a new location in Freshservice.

Use this tool to create a new location within the Freshservice platform. It should be called when there is a need to add a new geographical or organizational location to the service database.

parameters.name: location_name
parameters.description: Provide the name of the new location to be created.

parameters.name: location_unique_id
parameters.description: An integer representing the unique ID of the location to be created in Freshservice.

parameters.name: parent_location_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the parent location if applicable. Use this to nest the new location under an existing one.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the parent location

parameters.name: primary_contact_unique_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the primary contact. This contact is a requester, and their details will be referenced for name, email, and phone number.

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email and phone number will be referenced from the requester details)

parameters.name: address_street_line_one
parameters.description: First line of the street address for the new location in Freshservice.

parameters.name: address_line_2
parameters.description: The second line of the address, typically for additional location details or suite numbers.

parameters.name: city_name
parameters.description: The name of the city where the location is situated.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state or region of the location. This should be a string value representing the official name of the state.

parameters.name: location_country
parameters.description: Specify the country for the new location. This should be a valid country name.

parameters.name: location_zip_code
parameters.description: Provide the Zip Code for the location to be created.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the location

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the location

parameters.name: parent_location_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the parent location

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the parent location

parameters.name: primary_contact_id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email and phone number will be referenced from the requester details)

value_schema.description: Unique ID of the primary contact (Primary contact is a requester. The primary contact name, email and phone number will be referenced from the requester details)

parameters.name: address_line1
parameters.description: Address Line 1

parameters.name: address_line2
parameters.description: Address Line 2

parameters.name: address_city
parameters.description: City

parameters.name: address_state
parameters.description: State

parameters.name: address_country
parameters.description: Country

parameters.name: address_zipcode
parameters.description: Zip Code of the Location
